vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.34;
son of: Shomer (H7763H);
brother of: Ahi (H0277H), Jehubbah (H3160) and Aram (H0758J)
§ Rohgah = "clamour"
an Asherite of the sons of Shamer
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Sémer; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
羅迦 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "吵鬧"
亞設家族, 朔默的眾子之一 (代上 7:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
罗迦 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "吵闹"
亚设家族, 朔默的众子之一 (代上 7:34)
